title: 2023 Tripura ASSEMBLY ELECTIONS 🔴
desc:
Party wise seats
nopartySeatscolor
1BJP32
2TMP13
3CPM11
4INC3
5Indigenous1
The Legislative Assembly elections in Tripura are scheduled to be held in 2023, and the current ruling party is the BJP. The BJP is expected to focus on development issues, particularly infrastructure development and its record in improving law and order in the state. The CPIM and Congress are also expected to mount a strong challenge in the upcoming elections, with the CPIM likely to focus on improving social indicators and the Congress on issues of governance and accountability. The outcome of the elections is likely to be closely contested and will depend on a range of factors, including the performance of the ruling party, the strategies of the opposition parties, and the mood of the electorate.
